articles.author: Lisa Respers France
articles.title: Bruce Willis' wife shares recent photos of the actor since aphasia diagnosis - CTV News
articles.description: Bruce Willis' wife Emma Heming Willis shared a video and photos of the actor for the first time since revealing his aphasia diagnosis.
articles.content:
Bruce Willis and wife Emma Heming Willis got back to nature recently.
Heming Willis shared a video Tuesday on her Instagram Stories of her husband walking near a river with her and their 10-year-old… [+480 chars]

articles.title: PSEi in red anew amid decline in Asian markets - ANC 24/7
articles.description: The Philippine Stock Exchange index is again in the red joining a decline across other Asian markets.

articles.author: Livemint
articles.title: Tata's All-in-one Super-app ‘tata Neu’ Is Live For All Users | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Tata Neu will have in-house brands including Croma, Westside, AirAsia India, the Taj chain of luxury hotels and BigBasket, according to the group’s website.
articles.content:
Tata Neu, the Tata group's all-in-one flagship super-app, that was built to take on Amazon and Reliance's Jio Platforms, is live for general users.
Till today, the app was tested and was available o… [+3079 chars]

articles.title: Radio personality Divian Nair suffered health scare that caused half his face to droop - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The Kiss92 DJ was rushed to hospital earlier this week after his wife suspected he was having a stroke.
articles.content:
Kiss92 DJ Divian Nair had a health scare earlier this week when he was rushed to hospital on Monday after a severe migraine attack caused some paralysis on one side.

articles.title: Taiwanese singer A-Lin kicking off world tour in Singapore in May with large-scale concert - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Her A-Link with Passengers World Tour 2022 will be at the Singapore Indoor Stadium on May 28. Tickets go on sale on Apr 11.
articles.content:
A-Lin was last in Singapore in 2019 for a concert.

articles.description: Kardashian confirmed on Instagram that their Las Vegas wedding took place without a marriage licence.
